modName: Daedric Black and Gold Armour Retexture
summary: A Re-texture mod for Daedric Amour to add a Golden Trim Effect
descriptionHtml:
A Re-texture mod for Daedric Amour to add a Golden Trim Effect

Installation
Extract into the Data folder in your steam directory.

Steam Directory -> steamapps -> common -> skyrim -> Data

Uninstall
Just Delete the folder from the data folder it was saved in.

Tutorial on how to make custom textures yourself 
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GSXPxRD1cN0
author: o0o Recon o0o

files.name: Daedric Black and Gold Armour Retexture
